titles.title: Jesus You Are King of my heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Jesus you are King of my heart
Please make my heart Your home
You rule the world with mercy and truth
I bow before Your throne

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
King of my heart
King of my heart
Jesus You'll always be
King of my heart
King of my heart
Jesus You are to me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus You are King of my heart
I give my life to You
I want to bring You gladness and joy
In everything I do
